message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $150 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle at $130?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $130 is closer to what I had in mind, I can't let it go for less than $140.  I believe it's a fair price for the value you'll be getting.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $135. Can we meet in the middle at $137.50?
